title: Negotiate like the pros. Vol.2
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Negotiation
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Negotiation in business
description: Never pay too much, settle for too little or give in too soon again! This seminar presentation by John Patrick Dolan shows the tactics and countertactics of effective negotiations, such as why silence is such a powerful tool, how to use and respond to the "wince" tactic, and simple ways to defuse emotional outbursts and disarm hostile attacks!
